availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Dickerson (Garrard County, Kentucky, soldier - 2nd Lt. 11th Ky. Cav.)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Morgan Dickerson and Sally Dickerson. Married to Susannah Crow Dickerson in Hamilton County, Ohio, on September 18, 1861. Father of Louisa Dickerson. Attended school in Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Garrard County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant and first lieutenant from September 22, 1862 to April 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, District 1, p. 229B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p.750.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Bryantsville, p. 468B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 107.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film 000344481, p. 282.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 290.
"John H. Dickerson (1838-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial 226631467, accessed May 25, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/226631467.
